# https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spanish_phonology

# Vowels
a p[a]so
e p[e]so
i p[i]so
o p[o]so
u p[u]jo

# Dipthongs
ai [ai]re
au p[au]sa
ei r[ey]
eu n[eu]tro
oi h[oy]
ou b[ou]

ja hacia
je t[ie]rra
jo rad[io]
ju v[iu]da
wa c[ua]dro
we f[ue]go
wi b[ui]tre
wo c[uo]ta

# Consonants
b [b]ueno β
d [d]os ð
g [g]racias ɣ
m [m]ucho
n [n]os ŋ
ɲ ni[ñ]o
p [p]or
t [t]u
t͡ʃ mu[ch]a tʃ
k [q]ué
f per[f]ecto
θ gra[c]ias
s [s]í z
ʝ grac[i]as j
x [j]efe
l e[l]
ʎ [ll]ega
ɾ ot[r]a
r co[rr]ecto
